mainText:
Steve's awesome creation, brilliance shapes the technology of today's
entertainment. His creations are everywhere in the world, making bond with
billions of people. His stamina, energy really make me think. He is truly a
"Superman" to me. Today we have lost a great man, a inventor. He had talent
to predict what common people wants. Wherever he is, may his soul rests in
peace.
Steve, we will remember you always.
author: Aritra
